short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a sender symbol to all emails in your Gmail inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Gmail Sender Icons" is a browser plugin that allows you to add icons for individual emails (according to the sender's address) in your Gmail inbox with ease.

Simply install the extension in your browser and check or reload your Gmail inbox. For each message, you'll notice a symbol next to the - subject - column. The domain address of the email was used to create the icon. Please note that icons are designed to be 16 pixels wide by 16 pixels high.

Note: To hide icons, please press the toolbar button once to turn off the addon before refreshing the Gmail tab.

Important note: The Gmail Sender Icons for GmailTM add-on is not affiliated with Google Inc in any way. It is an unlicensed add-on produced and maintained independently by its creator. Google, Inc's GmailTM is a registered trademark.
